cause.description:
The African New Era Organization is currently based in Washington DC in partnership with Into Afrika Inc. as a fiscal agent and is in the process of acquiring a Non-Governmental Organization (NGO) status in Ghana.
The African New Era Organization (ANEO) mission is to revive and strengthen the education system in Africa by providing assistance and support. Its focus is to supply schools the necessary educational resources for kindergarten through secondary schools.
To achieve this mission, we : • Collect educational tools for schools in Africa. • Organize tuition assistance programs for African students • Foster a pen-pal program between African students & their American counterparts • Conduct a study exchange program for African and American students and educators • Facilitate a dialogue on issues affecting Africans on the continent and in the Diaspora
